content: size xs s m l xl measurements bust 98 103 107 117 122 cm full length 50 51 54 55 56 57 58 cm or desired length all measurements are of the finished garment body measurements + ease these measurements are based on knitting to the stated gauge yarn line 53% cotton 33% viscose 14% linen 50 grams = 110 meters yarn requirements light beige 2331 250 300 350 400 450 grams recommended needles 5 mm circular needle needle size is recommended if you knit tighter than the given gauge use bigger needles if you knit looser than the given gauge use smaller needles gauge 18 sts stocking st on 5 mm needles = 10 cm
